help-file.title: MEDITATE
help-file.content:
Syntax: meditate (while resting)
"Meditate" allows the player to memorize/pray for spells with a chance of halving the time. A single proficiency check is made at the half way point for each spell. If successful, the spell will be memorized/prayed for at that time. If unsuccessful, the spell will take the normal time before it is memorized/prayed. Because meditate is the focusing of the mind, most actions will stop the meditation.
